servicePoint.deliveryConditions:
Vehicle Collection information


Should you require our transfer service, we can collect you at your hotel totally free and deliver you to our office at Golf del Sur to enable you to collect your rental vehicle.

Adresse

Hotel Golf Plaza
Urb. Golf del Sur, Parcela A-H-1
San Miguel de Abona

Opening times

Monday to Sunday
08:30 - 13:00
17:00 - 20:00




See other pick up points here



You will be required to pay a deposit on renting your vehicle, the amount varies depending on the model. ( 100.00 for Basic vehicles). If you are returning your car at the airport, this deposit must be paid via credit / debit card, if you wish to leave the car at one of our offices, you have the possibility to pay also in cash.
servicePoint.returnConditions: The Vehicle should be returned to our office at Golf del Sur If you require , we can deliver you to your hotel totally free of charge (subject to availability).

Ctra. Gral. TF47, Km9
Guía de Isora

Opening times

Monday to Saturday
09:00 - 13:00
17:00 - 20:00

Sunday
09:00 - 13:00



See other pick up points here



You will be required to pay a deposit on renting your vehicle, the amount varies depending on the model. ( 100.00 for Basic vehicles). If you are returning your car at the airport, this deposit must be paid via credit / debit card, if you wish to leave the car at one of our offices, you have the possibility to pay also in cash.

IMPORTANT!

Our representative will wait for you at the meeting point for Rent a Car customers situated in the public car park floor S2

Descend to floor S2, to the public car park where.Once you have left the baggage Collection area and are situated in the arrivals hall, make your way along the passage on the left hand side past the escalator until you reach the lift area. You will find the meeting point area. Here our representative will organise our rental contract. (See the map detailed below)

Should you need to Contact our North Airport representative , you may do so on the emergency Mobile number (+34) 646 475 012. You may also contact us for any help on the following numbers (+34) 922 388 456 from 08.30 am until 13.00 pm and 16.30 pm until 20.00 pm ( until 19.00 pm on Sundays) or (+34) 922 792 919 from 08.30 am until 21.00 pm  Monday until Sunday.

You will be required to pay a deposit on renting your vehicle, the amount varies depending on the model. ( 100.00 for Basic vehicles). If you are returning your car at the airport, this deposit must be paid via credit / debit card, if you wish to leave the car at one of our offices, you have the possibility to pay also in cash.
servicePoint.returnConditions:
Your Vehicle may be returned to the North Airport in an easy manner and without any wait. Our representative will explain the procedure on the day you collect the car.

Do you wish to know more regarding the system for returning your vehicle. Click here and print out the images and instructions.

Bitte vergessen Sie nicht dass Sie eine Kaution von 100  hinterlegen müssen für unsere kleine bis mittelgrosse Autos. Für die Fahrzeuge in der höhere Preisklasse wird einen anderen Betrag verlangt und ist abhängig vom Modell. Wenn die Fahrzeugübertragung am Flughafen stattfindet soll die Kaution mit Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden, wenn Sie dagegen das Auto in einen von unseren Büros übernehmen können Sie den Betrag auch in bar hinterlegen.

Kennen Sie unsere Abholungsstelle hier

Bitte vergessen Sie nicht dass Sie eine Kaution von 100  hinterlegen müssen für unsere kleine bis mittelgrosse Autos. Für die Fahrzeuge in der höhere Preisklasse wird einen anderen Betrag verlangt und ist abhängig vom Modell. Wenn die Fahrzeugübertragung am Flughafen stattfindet soll die Kaution mit Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden, wenn Sie dagegen das Auto in einen von unseren Büros übernehmen können Sie den Betrag auch in bar hinterlegen.

servicePoint.deliveryConditions:
IMPORTANT

Our representative will wait for you at the meeting point for Rent a Car customers situated in the public car park in row A9.

Once you have left the baggage Collection area and are situated in the arrivals hall , make your way to the exit doors numbered 11 and 12 , follow the signs installed by the airport authorities indicating the car park area. (See the map detailed below)

Should you need to Contact our South Airport representative , you may do so on the emergency Mobile number (+34) 669 767 556. You may also contact us for any help on the following number (+34) 922 792 919 from 08.30 am until 21.00 pm  Monday until Sunday.



You will be required to pay a deposit on renting your vehicle, the amount varies depending on the model.( 100.00 for Basic vehicles). If you are returning your car at the airport, this deposit must be paid via credit / debit card, if you wish to leave the car at one of our offices , you have the possibility to pay also in cash.
servicePoint.returnConditions: You would deliver the car at the south airport following our staffs instructions.

servicePoint.deliveryConditions:
IMPORTANT

Our representative will wait for you at the meeting point for Rent a Car customers situated in the public car park in row A9.

Once you have left the baggage Collection area and are situated in the arrivals hall , make your way to the exit doors numbered 11 and 12 , follow the signs installed by the airport authorities indicating the car park area. (See the map detailed below)

Should you need to Contact our South Airport representative , you may do so on the emergency Mobile number (+34) 669 767 556. You may also contact us for any help on the following number (+34) 922 792 919 from 08.30 am until 21.00 pm  Monday until Sunday.
